overview: In a moving profile documentary, we meet Henare O’Keefe – the passionate community worker and tireless defender of the Hastings suburb of Flaxmere who through an extraordinary act of forgiveness turned a whole community into heroes .
tagline: Could you find it within yourself to forgive if the very people you’d been helping your whole life attacked your family?
title: Henare O’Keefe: Te Tuatangata
